title: (x) website graphics / unknown type - Gill Sans {Nick C}
content:
Hi everybody,  
I need to update a website and unfortunately can't contact the former webdesigner.

Could you please help me identify the fonts they used?

thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [weather.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202111743/http:/typophile.com/files/weather.png) | 360 bytes |
| [eventheader.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202111743/http:/typophile.com/files/eventheader.png) | 633 bytes |
| [virtualtour.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202111743/http:/typophile.com/files/virtualtour.png) | 531 bytes |
author: freakyfrog

comments.content:
Maybe Gill? who can tell at that size?

Nick Cooke
I would agree with Gill Sans - different weights though. Event Header looks like Light.
That horsey R shows up even at 6 pt. :)
